languages.text: "Э, нет, Ваша Светлость. Я говорил, что Дикарь не опасен, но "неопасность" заканчивается ровно на этом месте. Он может выкинуть фортель и запечь нас в рейсе, а корабль не должен лишиться еще одного Лорд-капитана".
languages.translation_comment: тут бы sfx "поезд завелся", если есть
тут бы sfx "поезд завелся", если есть

languages.text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Э, нет, Ваша Светлость. Я говорил, что Дикарь не опасен, но "неопасность" заканчивается ровно на этом месте. Он может выкинуть фортель и запечь нас в рейсе, а корабль не должен лишиться еще одного Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He could pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and the ship should not lose another Lord Captain."

"Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."

languages.text: «No exactamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. He dicho que Salvaje no es peligroso, pero eso acaba aquí. Lo mismo le da una pataleta y nos cocina durante el viaje, y no creo que la nave apreciara perder a otr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «No exactamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. He dicho que Salvaje no es peligroso, pero eso acaba aquí. Lo mismo le da una pataleta y nos cocina durante el viaje, y no creo que la nave apreciara perder a otr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「そうとは言い切れません、陛下。サベージは危険ではありませんが、それ以上ではありません。乗っている間に私たちを焼き殺してしまうかもしれない。ロード・キャプテンをまた失うのは避けたいです」
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「そうとは言い切れません、陛下。サベージは危険ではありませんが、それ以上ではありません。乗っている間に私たちを焼き殺してしまうかもしれない。ロード・キャプテンをまた失うのは避けたいです」

languages.text: “这恐怕不太行，大人。虽然我说过萨维奇不算危险，但这句话只能到此为止。如果继续前进的话，没人知道它会不会耍什么花招，把我们所有人活活烧死。我觉得，这艘船最好还是不要再失去一位领主舰长了。”
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “这恐怕不太行，大人。虽然我说过萨维奇不算危险，但这句话只能到此为止。如果继续前进的话，没人知道它会不会耍什么花招，把我们所有人活活烧死。我觉得，这艘船最好还是不要再失去一位领主舰长了。”

languages.text: "Nicht ganz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich sagte, dass Wild nicht gefährlich ist, aber "nicht gefährlich" endet genau hier. Er könnte uns während der Fahrt zu Tode backen, und es wäre besser, wenn das Schiff nicht noch einen Lord Captain verlöre."
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht ganz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich sagte, dass Wild nicht gefährlich ist, aber "nicht gefährlich" endet genau hier. Er könnte uns während der Fahrt zu Tode backen, und es wäre besser, wenn das Schiff nicht noch einen Lord Captain verlöre."

languages.text: « Vous n'y pensez pas, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous ai dit que Sauvage n'était pas dangereux, mais il ne faut pas pousser pour autant. Il pourrait à tout instant nous faire son cirque et nous rôtir tout vifs en chemin. Or, le vaisseau n'a vraiment pas besoin de perdre {mf|un autre seigneur-capitaine|une autre seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'y pensez pas, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous ai dit que Sauvage n'était pas dangereux, mais il ne faut pas pousser pour autant. Il pourrait à tout instant nous faire son cirque et nous rôtir tout vifs en chemin. Or, le vaisseau n'a vraiment pas besoin de perdre {mf|un autre seigneur-capitaine|une autre seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Maalesef o yolu tutamayız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hoyrat'ın tehlikeli olmadığını söyledim ama o 'tehlikeli değil' kısmı, burada son buluyor. Sürüş esnasında bizi oyuna getirip öldürene dek pişirebilir. Gemi bir tane daha Lord Kaptan kaybetmese iyi olur."
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I said Savage is not dangerous, but 'not dangerous' ends right here. He might just pull a stunt and bake us to death during the ride, and it would be better if the ship did not lose another Lord Captain."
